Date.description: The date of the data entry in YYYY-MM-DD format.

NewCases.description: The number of new cases reported on the specified date.

NewDeaths.description: The number of new deaths reported on the specified date.

TotalCases.description: The total number of cases reported up to the specified date.

TotalDeaths.description: The total number of deaths reported up to the specified date.

WeeklyCases.description: The number of new cases reported in the past week.

WeeklyDeaths.description: The number of new deaths reported in the past week.
